Locum midwife fails labouring mother, baby dies during birth after shoulder gets trapped https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/locum-midwife-fails-labouring-mother-baby-dies-during-birth-after-shoulder-gets-trapped/Q7K3QKM7IVFSPG5PQARRB5ODLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/locum-midwife-fails-labouring-mother-baby-dies-during-birth-after-shoulder-gets-trapped/Q7K3QKM7IVFSPG5PQARRB5ODLE/ Belinda FeekThe Health and Disability Commissioner found several failures by the midwife. Mon, 02 Dec 2024 01:17:18 +0000 A coroner determined the baby's death was caused by prolonged first and second stage labour complicated by shoulder dystocia.
Dementia danger: Where you live in NZ could be worsening your brain health https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dementia-danger-where-you-live-in-nz-could-be-worsening-your-brain-health/VR72DXMQPBDEXA7AB5WB4TOW2A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dementia-danger-where-you-live-in-nz-could-be-worsening-your-brain-health/VR72DXMQPBDEXA7AB5WB4TOW2A/ Jamie MortonWhere we live in NZ can raise our risk of cognitive decline – with poorer areas worse off. Sun, 01 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Cases of dementia are projected to jump from around 70,000 today to at least 170,000 by 2050, with the associated economic toll similarly soaring from $2.5 billion to $5.9b.
